page.title: 04PATHHEAD:ITS EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { ALTHOUGH PATHHEAD IS A RURAL VILLAGE VERY FEW OF THE ADULT POPULATION ARE EMPLOYED IN "COUNTRY TRADES".THE EMPLOYED MALE POPULATION OF PATHHEAD NUMBERS 244.OF THIS 244 ONLY 11 ARE EMPLOYED IN COUNTRY TRADES EG.FARMING , FORESTRY AND MARKET GARDENING.THE REMAINING OCCUPATIONS INCLUDE MINING,ENGINEERING AND COMPUTING.THE MAJORITY OF EMPLOYED ADULTS HAVE TO TRAVEL TO OTHER TOWNS TO WORK AND BECAUSE OF A POOR PUBLIC TRANSPORT SYSTEM THEY ARE FORCED TO USE THEIR OWN TRANSPORT.MOST OF THE FEMALE WORKERS TEND TO WORK IN THE LOCAL SHOPS AND SCHOOLS.SEVERAL ADULTS IN THE VILLAGE ARE EMPLOYED IN THE" COTTAGE INDUSTRIES ONE MAN PRODUCES WOODEN SALAD BOWLS,PORRIDGE SPURTLES AND SHORTBREAD MOULDS.THE PRODUCTS ARE SOLD ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.IN ADDITION
